Rulings.Edison:
●Iron Chain Repairman's second effect targets 1 Level 4 or lower Iron Chain monster in your GY.
●If Iron Chain Repairman attacks and its attack is negated, it can't activate its second effect in Main Phase 2.

Rulings.Base: 1. The second effect of "Iron Chain Repairman" targets 1 Level 4 or lower 'Iron Chain' monster in your GY.\n2. If "Iron Chain Repairman" attacks and its attack is negated, it cannot activate its second effect in Main Phase 2.
